column5: http://www.windsorstar.com/travel/Aspiring+photographer+finds+adrenaline+rush/3737545/story.html  Hey Brandon, hope you don't mind me posting this. I found it to be a great read on your adventure.  Great Job.
Great read for sure     Congrats Brandon Leechman

Thanks guys and thanks for posting it Krisco!  Definitely a first thing for me to have something written about what I've done in the paper so it was a pretty cool experience...I believe another local publication is sending a writer to interview me about the trip as well so we'll see how that turns out.
Good on ya Brandon.  I don't know how I would feel with a grizzly sneaking up on me.  You must have nerves of steel.
Some great stuff Brandon!!! Just don't get too complacent and end up as bear poo. Trust me, it's happened before up there..
Wow, great read, and that must have been a heart-stopping moment.
